title: Lower Energy Costs Act
summary: This bill addresses energy production on federal lands and waters, energy permitting, the electrical grid, and energy exports.

title: Secure the Border Act of 2023
summary: This bill addresses immigration and border security matters, including the construction of the border wall.

title: A bill to designate the clinic of the Department of Veterans Affairs in Gallup, New Mexico
summary: This bill designates the clinic of the Department of Veterans Affairs in Gallup, New Mexico, as the Hiroshi 'Hershey' Miyamura VA Clinic.

title: Fiscal Responsibility Act of 2023
summary: This bill suspends the public debt limit through January 1, 2025, and establishes new discretionary spending limits.

title: National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2024
summary: This bill authorizes FY2024 appropriations and sets forth policies for Department of Defense programs and activities.

title: Tax Relief for American Families and Workers Act of 2024
summary: This bill modifies various tax provisions, including expanding the child tax credit and extending several business tax provisions.

title: Bipartisan Infrastructure Law Technical Corrections Act
summary: This bill makes technical corrections to the Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act.

title: Servicemember Quality of Life Improvement and National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2025
summary: This bill authorizes FY2025 appropriations for Department of Defense activities and military construction.
